name: WooSplit – Google Experiments for WooCommerce
author: Shadi Manna

sections.description:
WooSplit – Google Experiments for WooCommerce enables the management of Google Experiments on WooCommerce pages. You can add as many Google Experiments as needed and specify which page, product or endpoint your experiment should be run on.

Plugin Features:

  • Add a Google Experiment and enter its “Experiment ID” and “Experiment Key” to link it to a WooCommerce page, product or endpoint. The correct Google Experiment tracking code will then be placed on that page, product or endpoint.
  • Edit a given Google Experiment
  • Delete a give Google Experiment, individually or by bulk

For more help with Google Experiments plugin and Conversion Rate Optimization contact WooSplit.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Google Experiments screen to manage Google Experiments
sections.faq:
What happens if I have two Experiments on the same page?

Only the first one will be added to the page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Bug fix remove logging message
  • Bug fix place Google Experiment script above Google Analytics code

1.0

  • First public release
